text: Ipoh is the capital of the Malaysian state of Perak. ==List of Ipoh areas== *Ampang *Anjung Tawas *Bandar Cyber Ipoh *Bandar Seri Botani *Bercham *Buntong *Canning Garden *Falim *Gugusan Manjoi *Gunung Rapat *Jelapang *Klebang *Kledang *Lahat *Meru *Menglembu *Pasir Putih *Pasir Pinji *Pengkalan *Pusat Bandar Raya (Pekan Lama, Pekan Baru & Greentown) *Rapat Setia *Silibin *Station 18 *Sunway City Ipoh *Tambun *Tanjung Rambutan *Tasek *Ulu Kinta ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Capital cities in Malaysia Category:Perak
title: Ipoh
